subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Lindsay Davenport’s troublesome right knee forced her to withdraw from the Bank of the West Classic in Stanford, Calif. It was the third time in six weeks that Davenport had pulled out of a tournament. Davenport, 32, was scheduled to play eighth-seeded Francesca Schiavone in a first-round match Tuesday evening, but dropped out after warming up Monday. Davenport was attempting to play for the first time since pulling out of her second-round match at Wimbledon.
